documentation.text:
@dev Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings.
 _Available since v4.5._

documentation.text: @dev Converts a `bytes` to its Bytes64 `string` representation.

natspec.details: Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings. _Available since v4.5._

opcodes: PUSH20 0x0 ADDRESS EQ PUSH1 0x80 PUSH1 0x40 MSTORE PUSH1 0x0 DUP1 REVERT INVALID LOG2 PUSH5 0x6970667358 0x22 SLT KECCAK256 INVALID 0xCF PUSH6 0x8C104C309FCC 0xCF 0xD7 0x29 MOD INVALID 0xCF 0xEA 0x29 0xB1 PUSH27 0x249862DBD4FB14CFCAF80A26A264736F6C634300080D0033000000
